overview: Classic, stackable, functional  Following the recent success of the Concorde collection, Folio by Steelite is pleased to introduce two new colourways in an elegant matt finish: Blanc and Noir. These contemporary shades have been crafted to complement the clean, architectural lines of the Concorde design, offering operators greater versatility in food presentation.

The Concorde range is imbued with the sophisticated aesthetics of classic Mid Century styling. Clean lines and a fresh, understated tactile surface are balanced with a warm, approachable, off-white body colour to provide a casual yet crisp food presentation style. All items are carefully designed to be discretely functional in a busy kitchen as well as providing excellent durability. Stackability is a key feature, enabling efficient storage of items, as is compatibility which allows different items to be stacked together and use a common saucer. Using both coupe and rimmed profiles, the Concorde range provides a Modern, yet functional aesthetic to showcase the very best cuisine.

product_name: Forager Nest Oval Platter 20.6 x 15.9 x 1.9cm (8 1/8 x 6 1/4 x  3/4")
overview: Forager by Robert Gordon is designed with a carefully applied reactive glaze that free-flows over each shape to create a unique finish on every piece. Now expanding with the introduction of oval plates and nest bowls, Forager provides even greater versatility for chefs and operators. The new shapes are thoughtfully crafted to enhance food presentation—oval plates offer elegant plating surfaces ideal for composed dishes, while the nest bowls bring layered dimension and depth to the table.

Introducing Caffè, the latest glassware range from RCR, thoughtfully crafted to elevate every sip. Each piece blends contemporary styling with practical, user-focused design, offering a perfect balance of aesthetics and performance. Whether enjoying a morning espresso or a leisurely afternoon latte, this collection brings a touch of barista-level refinement to the everyday coffee ritual, enhancing both the flavour and the experience.

product_name: Laguiole Marble Dark Horn Grill Knife 22.5cm (8 6/7")
overview: Steelite International proudly presents the Laguiole steak knife collection by Jean Dubost, a blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary performance. Each knife undergoes a specialised firing process that enhances blade flexibility while ensuring a consistently sharp, long-lasting edge. Designed with wide, robust blades, the knives feature a finely micro-serrated edge that delivers smooth, precise cuts without tearing - ideal for steak, grilled dishes, and even pizza. Offering exceptional versatility, they provide an elegant alternative to conventional pizza cutters, elevating both presentation and dining experience.

Modern shapes and textures inspired by Italian majolica bring brilliance, tradition, and timeless style. Every detail is designed to offer both functionality and beauty: an ergonomic design for a comfortable grip, airtight caps with silicone seals and bottles suitable for sparkling water, all elements that ensure practicality and safety with every use. Bucolic and decorative motifs enhance the design and material quality, transforming each piece into a small masterpiece of Italian craftsmanship.

The Celebrazione collection captures the spirit of celebration through a modern reinterpretation of classic stemware. Delicate detailing on the bowl and stem recalls the elegance of vintage handcrafted glass, while a luminous texture enhances brilliance and durability, turning every piece into a refined focal point. Perfect for professional catering and banqueting, these glasses are also designed to elevate the tabletop with unmistakable style, personality, and a sense of occasion.

overview: Perfect Tasting. Bodeguita del Medio stands out for its contemporary design, enriched with an elegant helical effect that enhances its modernity and originality. Available in three different capacities, this line of tumblers is designed to meet various needs, making it ideal for serving cocktails such as Gin Fizz, Negroni, and Rum, or beer.

Introducing Orbita, the latest addition to the Steelite Performance portfolio. Characterised by its elegant, flowing circular lines, Orbita naturally guides the eye toward the centre of the plate, providing an ideal canvas for chefs to showcase their culinary artistry. Its subtly organic, refined rim adds a contemporary, handcrafted sensibility that enhances presentations across both casual and fine dining environments.  Available in classic white and three semi-matte glazes: · Fuse Sable – warm, earthy, and understated · Fuse Tide – cool, fluid, and serene · Fuse Jet – bold, modern, and dramatic

Characterised by its elegant, flowing circular lines, Orbita naturally guides the eye toward the centre of the plate, providing an ideal canvas for chefs to showcase their culinary artistry. Its subtly organic, refined rim adds a contemporary, handcrafted sensibility that enhances presentations across both casual and fine dining environments.  Available in classic white and three semi-matte glazes: · Fuse Sable – warm, earthy, and understated · Fuse Tide – cool, fluid, and serene · Fuse Jet – bold, modern, and dramatic

Named after a port in Sicily, the Messina pattern is bright, bold and energetic, perfect for outdoor dining or bringing a Mediterranean feel to the table. All pieces are freezer, dishwasher and microwave proof, making a practical yet stunning collection.  With exciting new additions, introducing a trio of expressive hues:  Pink – playful, uplifting, and full of personality  Amber – warm, golden, and reminiscent of Sicilian sunsets  Aqua – refreshing, coastal, and inspired by Mediterranean waters
